snippet: The Cardinals’ 9-7 victory on Friday was a fitting capper to a rollicking set of division series in which, for the first time, all four pairings went the distance.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column says St Louis Cardinals 9-7 playoff victory over Washington Nationals is a fitting topper to a rollicking set of division series in which, for the first time, all four parings went the distance; notes that the Cardinals, San Francisco Giants, New York Yankees and Detroit Tigers have advanced to the championship series.
lead_paragraph: The Cardinals’ 9-7 victory on Friday was a fitting capper to a rollicking set of division series in which, for the first time, all four pairings went the distance.

headline.seo: Cardinals’ Win Caps Exciting Set of Division Series
headline.main: A Stamp on a Set of Division Series to Write Home About
headline.print_headline: A Stamp on a Set of Division Series to Write Home About
